publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-1454 Donald Gorrie: Dalziel High School, Motherwell-That the Parliament congratulates Dalziel High School in Motherwell on the success of its development and marketing of the school's own-label healthy options of low-fat and low-salt potato crisps and bottled water; believes that this enterprise is a fine example of the entrepreneurial spirit of Scotland's young people and potentially a positive step in the battle to provide healthy eating options for our young people, and calls for similar projects to be explored and instigated by Scotland's other local authorities.

S2M-1454 Donald Gorrie: Dalziel High School, Motherwell-That the Parliament congratulates Dalziel High School in Motherwell on the success of its development and marketing of the school's own-label healthy options of low-fat and low-salt potato crisps and bottled water; believes that this enterprise is a fine example of the entrepreneurial spirit of Scotland's young people and potentially a positive step in the battle to provide healthy eating options for our young people, and calls for similar projects to be explored and instigated by Scotland's other local authorities.
S2M-1454 Dalziel High School, Motherwell (lodged on 10 June 2004) Alex Neil*
S2M-1454 Dalziel High School, Motherwell (lodged on 10 June 2004) John Swinburne*, Nora Radcliffe*
